text: María Fátima Blázquez Lozano (born 14 May 1975) is a road cyclist from Spain. She represented her nation at the 1996 Summer Olympics in the women's road race and at the 2000 Summer Olympics in the women's road race. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Spanish female cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Spain Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Salamanca Category:Cyclists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:1975 births
title: Fátima Blázquez
